title: SmartSafeHQ
author: SmartSafeHQ
content: Hey everyone,I'm thrilled to announce the launch of SmartSafe, the revolutionary new platform for managing digital assets on Ethereum and multiple EVMs. Our user-friendly crypto storage is designed with safety as our top priority for individuals, DAOs, investors, and beyond.SmartSafe is breaking new ground with cutting-edge concepts of Account Abstraction and offering top-notch features like multi-sig signatures and automatic transfers to guarantee the safety of your assets.We're currently in private beta testing, and as a thank you to our early adopters and testers, we're offering an exciting airdrop of our very own token, $SAFU.Our mission is to provide a safe and user-friendly environment for managing digital assets, and we believe our platform is unique and innovative. We're eager to hear your thoughts on it!SmartSafe is proud to be backed by a startup that is participating in an acceleration program with the Brazilian Central Bank, and to be building its MVP in partnership with a major credit card company. These partnerships validate our platform and provide us with unique insights and opportunities to better serve our users. Integrating with traditional financial services through our partnership will make it even easier for users to manage their digital assets. We're excited to be at the forefront of this innovative industry and look forward to providing you with the safest and most user-friendly platform for managing your digital assets.Stay up-to-date with our progress and learn more about SmartSafe by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/SmartSafeHQ, and joining our lively Discord community at https://discord.gg/TTreuxXyzd.Check out our website at https://www.smartsafe.finance/ for more information.Thank you for your interest, and we can't wait to connect with all of you soon! Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to take control of your digital assets and join the SmartSafe revolution.

comments.author: SmartSafeHQ
comments.body: Our token is not released yet. Please be aware of scams
